channel.title: Int help

item.title: Int help
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

Ok, for my server I’m trying to make a waay better mage system but whenever I add an int it says it might not have been initialized, heres what I put.

if (magicID == 1152 && playerLevel[6] >= 1) { // Wind Strike if (playerHasItemAmount(rune1, rune1Amount)) { ProjectileSpell(90, 95, 92, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 2, 3, 566, 558, 1, 1); stillgfx(1, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); attackNPCSWithin(1, 3, 1); attackPlayersWithin(1, 3, 1); hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(2); } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 0) { sendMessage("You need a level of 1 to cast this spell"); } else if (!playerHasItemAmount(rune1, rune1Amount)) { sendMessage("You don't have the required runes to cast this spell"); } }
And for the ints I put right above it with the other ints for all this-

int casterX = absX; int casterY = absY; int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX2) * -1; int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY2) * -1; int rune1 = rune1; int rune1Amount = rune1Amount;
Of course I added the rune1 ints, with phonescape v2 source
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 02:35:28 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know how to help me??[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 03:26:39 PM[/size][hr]Please I really need this to work…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 04:24:07 PM[/size][hr]No-one knows about this?

Read full topic
